backend/main.mo: IC canister managing products, inventory, sales, stock rules, cash transactions, user profiles, and stock adjustments with access control and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a low‑stock color update to frontend/src/index.css with metadata and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including pages, hooks, modals, and global styles.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind OKLCH color variables defining theme tokens for light and dark modes with radius, background, foreground, and accent settings.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing view routing, layout, and global QueryClientProvider with navbar and footer.
frontend/src/components/AdjustStockModal: Modal for adjusting inventory stock with validation, mutation call, error normalization, and description requirement.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard showing revenue, quantities, payment summaries, low‑stock banner, and inventory-driven UI using React Query.
frontend/src/components/EditInventoryIte: Modal form to edit an inventory item with validation, duplicate name checks, and update mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/EditSaleModal.ts: Modal to edit an existing sale, allowing item adjustments, validation, and submitting updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/InventoryFormMod: Form modal for creating new inventory items with stock calculations, validation, and duplicate name checks.
frontend/src/components/InventoryPage.ts: Main inventory page showing inventory list with add, adjust, and edit actions plus loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/InventoryReportP: Page displaying inventory adjustment history with filters, loading/error handling, and tabular report output.
frontend/src/components/LowStockBanner.t: Banner showing a table of low‑stock inventory items requiring attention.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Renders the main navbar with view switching and a dropdown for report-related submenu items.
frontend/src/components/ProductFormModal: Provides a modal form to add a new product, including image upload and validation.
frontend/src/components/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays the product catalog with loading/error states and allows opening the add‑product modal.
frontend/src/components/QuantityPromptMo: Shows a modal for entering quantity when adding a product, with subtotal calculation.
Reusable error display component with normalized messages and a retry button.
Loads and displays sales reports with edit/delete actions and Excel export support.
frontend/src/components/SignInRequiredSt: Shows a sign‑in prompt with Internet Identity when authentication is required.
frontend/src/components/StockDeductionRu: Empty or missing content; no functionality defined.
Implements the transaction UI, managing cart state, quantity prompts, checkout logic, and sale recording via backend mutations.
frontend/src/constants/productOptions.ts: Defines constant lists of product categories, sizes, and names along with related TypeScript types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's backend role with safe fallbacks, intended only for informational purposes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardSummary.t: Queries the backend for dashboard summary metrics using an anonymous actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, identity persistence, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvalidateActorQue: Exposes a helper to invalidate all actor-related queries for retrying requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: Provides queries and mutations for listing, adding, updating, and adjusting inventory via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventoryReport.ts: Queries filtered inventory report entries from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches product list and provides mutation for adding new products.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicActor.ts: Creates and maintains an anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordSale.ts: Handles recording new sales and invalidates dashboard and inventory data after success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesMutations.ts: Provides mutations to update or delete sales and refresh sales reports and dashboard data.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesReport.ts: Queries sales records within a given timestamp range using a public actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStockDeductionRule: File exists but contains no implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and many CSS variables for light/dark themes and UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessage.ts: Normalizes various backend error messages into user-friendly titles and texts.
frontend/src/utils/exportToXls.ts: Generates an Excel-compatible HTML table from sales line items and triggers file download.
frontend/src/utils/inventoryName.ts: Provides name normalization and duplicate‑checking utilities for inventory items.
frontend/src/utils/salesFormat.ts: Formats currency, dates, and payment method labels for sales data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, color tokens, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature tracking, and state management for the Sales Inventory Dashboard.
